name: Intellisense Precompiled Header File
summary: Learn about .IPCH files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: For Visual C++ projects, an iPCH file is saved within the \​ipch\​ project subdirectory.
Visual C++ is part of Microsoft's Visual Studio development environment software.

description: Developer file used by Microsoft Visual C++, an IDE used for Windows C++ programming; contains precompiled header information used by Intellisense, Microsoft's code assistance module used for code hinting, documentation, and autocompletion while the programmer types source code.
